Title: Requires the office of temporary and disability assistance to provide an informational notice to supportive housing tenants
Summary: Requires the office of temporary and disability assistance to provide an informational notice to supportive housing tenants which contains information about a supportive housing tenant's rights as a tenant, information about their building and other related information.
LawCode: Add ยง131-cc, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring supervising state and city agencies to provide an informational notice to supportive housing tenants
